= Ubuntu/Debian =

If you are using .deb based distributions can use apt-get to install QuickSynergy:

{{{
sudo apt-get install quicksynergy
}}}

But note that QuickSynergy version available in these distros can differ from the latest version [http://code.google.com/p/quicksynergy/downloads/list available to download].
